.. _`IMAS-Python 101`:

IMAS-Python 101
===============

In this IMAS-Python training, we introduce you to the basic concepts and features of
IMAS-Python. You will need some basic familiarity with Python. For a refresher, see
the `Python tutorial <https://docs.python.org/3/tutorial/>`_. We also assume
some basic knowledge of the ITER IMAS infrastructure.

    :caption: Training contents
    :maxdepth: 1

    basic/create
